text: Pen God, ne Klays ayɨp kɨli apɨlmɨŋal jɨmñɨl chɨnop poŋɨd amel, kɨlop kɨdek gɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg takaw agɨlɨg agobun. Anɨb agobun, Kɨli apɨlmɨŋal bɨ mɨlɨk nepal okok ayɨp penpen gɨl, kɨlop pak yuk yokɨpil agobun. Kɨli apɨlmɨŋal anɨgel, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨli nɨŋɨd God nop nɨgtep gɨpal. Pen nop gos anɨb ak, tap kuy tep owup ak yɨgen dad apɨl, keke ameb tek mɨdeb. God gup tek anɨb ak nɨŋɨd nɨm, nop tep yɨbɨl apin.
